sentences.sentence: "Now just wiggle your shoulders this way," he said, "and let go."
sentences.translation: “现在就像这样扭动你的肩膀，”他说，“然后飞起来。”

sentences.sentence: Players also get nifty tools with names like "shake", "wiggle" or "rubber band".
sentences.translation: 玩家还可以获得俏皮的工具如“摇动”、“摆动”、“橡皮筋”。

sentences.sentence: Charged particles called ions travel along the nanowire, causing it to stretch out in length and also bend and wiggle.
sentences.translation: 被称为离子的带电粒子沿着纳米线移动，导致它伸长、弯曲和摆动。
